column5: I was wondering if the ID requirements have changed going into Mannitoba. I heard nothing has changed from past years. Does anyone know what the rules are or how I would find out. Are all the provinces the same? Thanks in advance.

Hey Road,All the provinces are the same, it's all under Federal jurisdiction. Bring a passport if you can or two pieces of id with pictures and signatures. A birth certificate would be usefull as well.
